questions.question: The first example of the Prototype pattern was in _____ system in 1964.
The Gang of Four popularized and codified the Prototype Pattern in their book _______.
questions.answer: Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software

questions.question: A prototype pattern is a ______ design pattern that focuses on creating objects by copying an existing object.
In the Prototype Pattern, a prototype object serves as a ________, and new objects are created by duplicating this prototype.
The _________ is responsible for creating new objects by requesting the prototype to clone itself.
